name: Havenbedrijf Rotterdam NV
goal: The objective of the Port of Rotterdam Authority is to enhance the port of Rotterdamâ€™s competitive position as a logistics hub and a world-class industrial complex. The Port of Rotterdam Authority manages, operates and develops the port and industrial area of Rotterdam. Not only in terms of size, but also in terms of quality. The Port Authority is responsible for maintaining the safe and smooth handling of all shipping. We invest in the development of the existing port area, in new port sites, public infrastructure and in handling shipping.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- TEN-T / Connecting Europe Facility transport
- Rail freight transport
- Maritime transport
- EU ETS
- Port Reception Facilities
- Reporting formalities directive
- Energy Union
- Renewable energy directive
- Combined transport directive
- Alternative fuels
- circular economy
